Title: Drained
Writer: Marçal Aquino, Heitor Dhalia, Lourenço Mutarelli (novel)
Actors: Selton Mello, Paula Braun, Paulo Alves, Suzana Alves
Plot: A pawn shop proprietor buys used goods from desperate locals--as much to play perverse power games as for his own livelihood, but when the perfect rump and a backed-up toilet enter his life, he loses all control.
